articles.author: Analysis by Chris Cillizza, CNN Editor-at-large
articles.title: The huge contradiction at the heart of Jeff Sessions' Russia explanation
articles.description: Attorney General Jeff Sessions was adamant about one thing during his hours-long testimony in front of the House judiciary committee on Tuesday: He has never lied under oath regarding what he knew and when he knew it about the interactions between the presidential campaign of Donald Trump and Russia.

articles.author: Tal Kopan, CNN
articles.title: Sessions said he didn't lie under oath
articles.description: Trump's repeated public comments attacking the Justice Department has not influenced ongoing investigations, Attorney General Jeff Sessions said Tuesday

articles.title: Sessions: I pushed back on Trump-Putin meeting - CNN Video
articles.description: US Attorney General Jeff Sessions says he pushed back when George Papadopoulos suggested a meeting between candidate Donald Trump and Russian President Vladimir Putin.

articles.author: Brian Ries, Amanda Wills and Veronica Rocha, CNN
articles.title: It's a big day on Capitol Hill: Follow live
articles.description: There are three major hearings today: One with Jeff Sessions, another on sexual harassment, and a third on the authority to order the use of nuclear weapons. Watch live here.

articles.author: Analysis by Chris Cillizza, CNN Editor-at-large
articles.title: Jeff Sessions sure looks like he is taking orders from Trump on a Clinton special counsel
articles.description: On November 2, in a radio interview, President Donald Trump said this: "The saddest thing is that because I'm the President of the United States, I am not supposed to be involved with the Justice Department. I am not supposed to be involved with the FBI."

articles.title: Rep. Speier: Victims assaulted on House floor - CNN Video
articles.description: Rep. Jackie Speier (D-CA) speaks out on sexual harassment during a briefing on Capitol Hill, saying she has heard stories of "victims having their private parts grabbed on the House floor."

articles.author: MJ Lee, Sunlen Serfaty, Sara Ganim and Juana Summers, CNN
articles.title: More than 50 people describe sexual harassment in Congress
articles.description: Be extra careful of the male lawmakers who sleep in their offices -- they can be trouble. Avoid finding yourself alone with a congressman or senator in elevators, late-night meetings or events where alcohol is flowing. And think twice before speaking out about sexual harassment from a boss -- it could cost you your career.

articles.author: Phil Mattingly and Lauren Fox, CNN
articles.title: Individual mandate repeal to be included in Senate's tax bill
articles.description: Republican senators will include a repeal of Obamacare's individual mandate in the revised version of the chamber's tax overhaul to be released by the Senate finance committee Tuesday afternoon, according to two GOP aides. The committee's Republicans were unanimous in their support for adding the repeal.

articles.author: Lauren Fox, CNN
articles.title: House presses ahead with tax vote Thursday
articles.description: House Republicans are forging ahead with plans to vote on their tax bill Thursday just weeks after the legislation was first released.

articles.author: Donna Borak
articles.title: Tax reform: It's now or never, says White House adviser Gary Cohn
articles.description: The White House's director of the National Economic Council Gary Cohn on Tuesday underscored the urgency to meet the administration's deadline of completing a tax overhaul as Congress prepares to wrestle with other top priorities next month.
